title: Add link to external Lovable app

requirements.text: Add a navigation link or button that opens https://reflect-and-create.lovable.app/ in a new tab

quotes: CAN YOU JUST PUT THE LINK

acceptanceCriteria: A clickable link or button is visible in the application interface
Clicking the link opens https://reflect-and-create.lovable.app/ in a new browser tab
The link uses target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' for security

constraints: Must preserve existing navigation structure and layout
Must not modify read-only UI component sources in frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Embedding the external application via iframe
Recreating the Lovable app functionality within this project
Integrating with the external application's API
